@HornyHammer it's even worse ending... He use the pills to destroy the mental of his father as revenge, then sends the real husband to Colombia by order of the main MC and he dissapears (Hinted to be killed/kidnaped when he reaches there, an that's when she's given the pill to have amnesia. In the present she comes back to her house only to find out it's occupied by other person (Someone with a deal with the MC), so he knocks her and calls the MC, then he procceeds to make her forget everything again. And her secretary is also made forget everything when she tried to call the police on this. And that's it. That's how it ends... in the same way it started... I wasted my time with that
what a shame...the art is breathtakingly phenomenal but unfortunately the story is garbage. its just a turd wrapped in a pretty bow.

Do not bother reading this trash,its your typical ntr manhwa.I read the raws and the MCs father ends up fucking(raping) the main girl and the MC sees all of it and ends up crying so damn loud lmfao.It happens when the MC and the short haired girl goes out to fuck somewhere around a tree while the father comes up to the main girl who is sleeping and ends up fucking her.The translated chapters are trash already and the plot is meh so unless you're a veteran who loves NTR you can go ahead and laugh at this dumb plotted manhwa,otherwise for the weak heart you might as well quit before its too late.The last time I checked the raws stopped at the part where the father fucks the main girl in front of the MC and it hasn't been updated for over a year.
